venue.name: Rogers Place
venue.address: 10220 104 Ave NW, Edmonton, AB T5J 0H6, Canada

Rinkside.Description: Seats right next to the action for an unparalleled game experience.
Rinkside.View_Quality: Direct ice-level view, engaging and immersive experience.
Rinkside.Unique_Features: Chance for player interactions, possibility of being seen on TV.
Rinkside.Accessibility: Easy access, but limited space for personal mobility devices.
Rinkside.Special_Perks: Exclusive access to the Ice Club, complimentary dining and beverages.

Club_Seats.Description: Offering a fantastic view of the game from the sides with added benefits.
Club_Seats.View_Quality: Elevated side views with clear line of sight to the ice.
Club_Seats.Unique_Features: Wider seats with more leg room, less crowded sections.
Club_Seats.Accessibility: Dedicated entrance for easier access, nearby elevators.
Club_Seats.Special_Perks: Access to premium clubs and in-seat wait service.

Center_Balcony.Description: Great overall view of the game from an elevated position.
Center_Balcony.View_Quality: Panoramic view of the ice, ideal for tactical analysis.
Center_Balcony.Unique_Features: Affordable pricing for a comprehensive view of the action.
Center_Balcony.Accessibility: Accessible seating available, elevators to balcony level.
Center_Balcony.Special_Perks: More budget-friendly option with a full view of the ice.

Loge_Level.Description: Just above courtside, offering close views without being on the ice.
Loge_Level.Sections: Mid Ice Sections 15-17 and 1-2; Corners Sections 13-14, 18-19, 22-23, and 3-4
Loge_Level.View_Quality: Close to the action with a slightly elevated perspective.
Loge_Level.Unique_Features: Proximity to the ice with a more accessible price point.
Loge_Level.Special_Perks: Good balance of price, view, and experience.

restaurants_bars.name: Rogers Place
restaurants_bars.description: At the heart of Edmonton's entertainment district, Rogers Place itself offers a variety of dining options within and around the arena, catering to all tastes.

restaurants_bars.name: Mercer Tavern
restaurants_bars.description: A historic tavern near Rogers Place, offering a selection of local craft beers and classic pub fare in a lively atmosphere.

restaurants_bars.name: The Canadian Brewhouse
restaurants_bars.description: A well-loved chain with a vibrant atmosphere, serving a wide variety of beers and hearty Canadian dishes, just a short walk from the game.

restaurants_bars.name: Rostizado
restaurants_bars.description: Offering modern Mexican cuisine in a chic setting, Rostizado is known for its innovative dishes and cocktails, situated in the historic Mercer Warehouse.

restaurants_bars.name: CRAFT Beer Market
restaurants_bars.description: Features a vast selection of craft beers and a diverse menu in a spacious setting, ideal for gatherings and pre-game dining.

restaurants_bars.name: Tres Carnales Taquería
restaurants_bars.description: Authentic and lively, this downtown spot is celebrated for its tacos and Mexican street food, offering a taste of Mexico in Edmonton.

restaurants_bars.name: DOSC
restaurants_bars.description: A unique blend of steakhouse and café, DOSC delights with craft cocktails and sophisticated dining near Rogers Place.

accommodations.name: The Westin Edmonton
accommodations.address: 10135 100 St NW, Edmonton, AB T5J 0N7, Canada
accommodations.description: A contemporary hotel offering upscale rooms, a fitness center, and dining, conveniently located in downtown Edmonton.

accommodations.name: Courtyard by Marriott Edmonton Downtown
accommodations.address: 1 Thornton Ct, Edmonton, AB T5J 2E7, Canada
accommodations.description: Modern hotel offering stylish rooms, a fitness center, and dining options, close to Rogers Place and downtown attractions.

accommodations.name: Matrix Hotel
accommodations.address: 10640 100 Ave NW, Edmonton, AB T5J 3N8, Canada
accommodations.description: A chic, modern hotel offering sleek rooms, a fitness center, and dining options, within walking distance to Rogers Place and downtown Edmonton.

accommodations.name: Fairmont Hotel Macdonald
accommodations.address: 10065 100 St NW, Edmonton, AB T5J 0N6, Canada
accommodations.description: A historic luxury hotel offering elegant rooms, fine dining, and breathtaking views of the North Saskatchewan River valley, located near downtown Edmonton.

accommodations.name: Union Bank Inn
accommodations.address: 10053 Jasper Ave NW, Edmonton, AB T5J 1S5, Canada
accommodations.description: A boutique hotel offering upscale rooms, dining, and event spaces, situated in the heart of downtown Edmonton, within walking distance to Rogers Place.

tourist_attractions.name: Fort Edmonton Park
tourist_attractions.description: A living history museum offering an immersive glimpse into Edmonton's past with reconstructed historical buildings and engaging activities.

tourist_attractions.name: Whyte Avenue
tourist_attractions.description: A vibrant neighborhood known for its arts and culture, shopping, dining, and entertainment in the Old Strathcona area.

tourist_attractions.name: Muttart Conservatory
tourist_attractions.description: Features four glass pyramids with plants from different ecosystems around the world.

tourist_attractions.name: Alberta Legislature Building
tourist_attractions.description: A historic site and government hub with guided tours available, set in picturesque grounds.

tourist_attractions.name: Art Gallery of Alberta
tourist_attractions.address: 2 Sir Winston Churchill Square, Edmonton, Alberta
tourist_attractions.description: A modern art museum featuring a wide range of exhibitions and collections, emphasizing Western Canada.

tourist_attractions.name: University of Alberta Botanic Garden
tourist_attractions.description: A vast garden area offering a variety of plant species and themed gardens, including the Aga Khan Garden.

tourist_attractions.name: Royal Alberta Museum
tourist_attractions.description: Expansive galleries exploring Alberta's natural and human history, including a Children's Gallery.

tourist_attractions.name: Elk Island National Park
tourist_attractions.description: A national park offering a refuge for wildlife, outdoor activities, and a chance to see the Northern Lights.

tourist_attractions.name: TELUS World of Science
tourist_attractions.description: Features interactive exhibits on science and technology, an observatory, and an IMAX theatre.

tourist_attractions.name: Edmonton Valley Zoo
tourist_attractions.description: A family-oriented zoo focusing on conservation research, with over 350 animals representing 100 species.

team_related_activities.name: Rogers Place Tours
team_related_activities.description: Explore Rogers Place with guided tours that showcase the state-of-the-art facilities, including the Oilers Hall of Fame, featuring memorabilia from the Oilers' glory years.

team_related_activities.name: Ford Hall Public Art
team_related_activities.description: Experience the artistic side of Rogers Place in Ford Hall, featuring the 'Iron Foot Place' mosaic by renowned Aboriginal artist Alex Janvier, among other public art pieces.

team_related_activities.name: Ice District
team_related_activities.description: Rogers Place is part of the vibrant Ice District, offering dining, entertainment, and shopping options, including the Grand Villa Casino and the Molson Canadian Hockey House.

options.description: The Edmonton LRT system provides easy access to Rogers Place, with several stations conveniently located near the arena.
Edmonton's extensive bus network serves Rogers Place, ensuring straightforward access from various parts of the city.

best_places_to_buy.name: Official Edmonton Oilers Website
best_places_to_buy.description: The primary source for all Oilers ticket sales, offering guaranteed authenticity and the best selection of seats.

best_places_to_buy.name: Ticketmaster
best_places_to_buy.description: Authorized ticketing partner for the Edmonton Oilers, providing a secure platform for purchasing official tickets.

best_places_to_buy.name: StubHub
best_places_to_buy.description: A reliable secondary marketplace for Oilers tickets, offering a fanProtect guarantee.

ticket_purchasing_tips.ways_to_save: Buying tickets during the mid-week can often be cheaper than weekend games. Group ticket discounts often apply for groups of 10 or more. Some games may have last-minute ticket sales closer to the game day.
ticket_purchasing_tips.avoiding_scalpers: Always buy tickets from verified sources to avoid scams. If buying on the secondary market, ensure the website offers buyer guarantee. Avoid buying printed tickets from individuals on site as these can be duplicates or forgeries.
